summary: Depicts a cast of fine artists and eccentric scientists (from MIT and NASA) who have devoted their lives to the unlikely medium of modern origami. Through their determination to reinterpret... See full summary »
cast: Erik D. Demaine|Martin L. Demaine|Vincent Floderer|Miri Golan|Vanessa Gould|Tom Hull|Paul Jackson|Eric Joisel|Michael LaFosse|Robert Lang|Christopher K. Palmer|Richard L. Alexander|Brian Chan|Satoshi Kamiya|Sam Nathans|Bernard Peyton|Jonathan Schneider|Akira Yoshizawa
title: Entre pliegues
